CustomBehavior.Code: bool LoadAlliance = false; bool LoadHorde = false;
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[Notification]: We will finish the Pandaren starting zone as Alliance!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[Notification]: If you want to change the faction, you must RELOAD the autoloader!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[Notification]: We will finish the Pandaren starting zone as Horde!");
Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[Notification]: If you want to change the faction, you must RELOAD the autoloader!");

CustomBehavior.Code: Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "Hearthing would be faster to reach our destination, attempting to Hearth!");

Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "Hearthing would be faster, but our Hearthstone is on cooldown. Attempting to Astrall Recall!");

Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "Hearthing would be faster to reach our destination, using Innkeeper's Daughter!");

Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're in northen Eastern Kingdoms. Using the Orb of Translocation to enter Undercity.");

Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Western Northrend, using the Warsong Hold zeppelin to Orgrimmar.");
Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Northrend, using the Dalaran portal to Orgrimmar.");

Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Eastern Northrend, using the Vengeance Landing zeppelin to Undercity.");

Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Isle of Quel'Danas, using the Flight Master to Undercity.");
Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "Aborting flight since our Garrison Hearth is off cooldown..");
Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Outlands, using the Shattrath portal to Orgrimmar.");
Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Deepholm, using the portal for Orgrimmar.");
Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Pandaria, using the Shrine portal to Undercity.");
Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "Picking up Draenor introductory quest.");

Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're in Kalimdor, taking the Orgrimmar portal to Blasted Lands.");
Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We're near the Dark Poral, interacting with Khadgar.");
Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(System.Windows.Media.Colors.DeepSkyBlue, "[Azyul Navigator]: ", System.Windows.Media.Colors.LightGreen, "We have reached Draenor!");
